element_enrichments.example:

</Billboard>

element_enrichments.name: Binary
element_enrichments.remarks: Embeds a binary file in the MSI. Used for custom action DLLs, icons, and other resources.

element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Bal (Bootstrapper Application Library) extension. Requires WixToolset.Bal.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Bundle
element_enrichments.example:
<Bundle Name="My Application Setup"
    Version="1.0.0.0"
    Manufacturer="My Company"
    UpgradeCode="{GUID}">
    <BootstrapperApplication>
        <bal:WixStandardBootstrapperApplication Theme="hyperlinkLicense" />
    </BootstrapperApplication>
    <Chain>
        <MsiPackage SourceFile="MyApp.msi" />
    </Chain>
</Bundle>
element_enrichments.remarks: Defines a bootstrapper bundle. Use for chaining multiple packages, prerequisites, or creating an installer that wraps MSI packages.

element_enrichments.name: Certificate
element_enrichments.example:
<iis:Certificate Id="MyCert"
    Name="My SSL Certificate"
    StoreLocation="localMachine"
    StoreName="MY"
    CertificatePath="cert.pfx"
    PFXPassword="[CERT_PASSWORD]" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Installs SSL certificates for IIS bindings.

element_enrichments.name: CertificateRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Chain
element_enrichments.remarks: Contains the packages to install in a bundle. Packages install in order listed.

element_enrichments.name: CheckRebootRequired
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Class
element_enrichments.example:
<Class Id="{GUID}"
    Context="InprocServer32"
    Description="My COM Class"
    ThreadingModel="apartment" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: CloseApplication
element_enrichments.example:
<util:CloseApplication Id="CloseMyApp"
    Target="MyApp.exe"
    RebootPrompt="no"
    PromptToContinue="yes"
    Description="Please close [ProductName] before continuing." />
element_enrichments.remarks: Closes running applications before installation. Helps avoid 'files in use' errors.

element_enrichments.name: Column
element_enrichments.example:
<Column Id="Value"
    PrimaryKey="no"
    Type="string"
    Width="255"
    Nullable="yes"
    Category="text" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ComPlusApplication
element_enrichments.example:
<complus:ComPlusApplication Id="MyApp"
    Name="My COM+ Application"
    Activation="local"
    Description="Sample COM+ application" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the ComPlus extension for COM+ application deployment. Requires WixToolset.ComPlus.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the ComPlus extension for COM+ application deployment. Requires WixToolset.ComPlus.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: ComboBox
element_enrichments.example:
<ComboBox Property="MYOPTION">
    <ListItem Value="Option1" Text="First Option" />
    <ListItem Value="Option2" Text="Second Option" />
</ComboBox>
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: CommandLine
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ComplianceDrive
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Component
element_enrichments.example:
<Component Id="MainExecutable"
    Guid="*"
    Directory="INSTALLDIR">
    <File Id="MyApp.exe" Source="bin\MyApp.exe" KeyPath="yes" />
</Component>
element_enrichments.remarks: Components are the atomic unit of installation. Best practice: one file per component with Guid='*' for auto-generation.

element_enrichments.name: ComponentGroup
element_enrichments.remarks: Groups components for easier referencing. Use to organize related components and simplify Feature definitions.

element_enrichments.name: ComponentGroupRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ComponentRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ComponentSearch
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: ComponentSearchRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Condition
element_enrichments.example:
<bal:Condition Message="This bundle requires .NET 4.8 or later.">
    NETFRAMEWORK48
</bal:Condition>
element_enrichments.remarks: Bundle condition displayed to user. Shows Message when condition is false.

element_enrichments.name: Configuration
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.example:
<Control Id="NextButton"
    Type="PushButton"
    X="236" Y="243" Width="56" Height="17"
    Default="yes"
    Text="&Next" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: CopyFile
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Custom
element_enrichments.remarks: Schedules a custom action in a sequence. Use Before/After to position relative to other actions.

element_enrichments.name: CustomAction
element_enrichments.remarks: Defines a custom action. Use sparingly; prefer built-in WiX elements. Deferred actions run with elevated privileges.

element_enrichments.name: CustomActionRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: CustomTable
element_enrichments.example:
<CustomTable Id="MyTable">
    <Column Id="Key" PrimaryKey="yes" Type="string" Width="72" />
    <Column Id="Value" Type="string" Width="255" Nullable="yes" />
    <Row>
        <Data Column="Key">Setting1</Data>
        <Data Column="Value">Value1</Data>
    </Row>
</CustomTable>
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: CustomTableRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Data
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: DeleteServices
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Dependency
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Dialog
element_enrichments.example:
<Dialog Id="MyDialog"
    Width="370" Height="270"
    Title="[ProductName] Setup">
    <Control Id="Title" Type="Text" X="10" Y="10" Width="350" Height="20" Text="Welcome" />
</Dialog>
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: DialogRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: DigitalSignature
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Directory
element_enrichments.example:
<Directory Id="INSTALLDIR" Name="MyApp">
    <Directory Id="ConfigDir" Name="config" />
    <Directory Id="DataDir" Name="data" />
</Directory>
element_enrichments.remarks: Defines a directory structure. Nest directories to create folder hierarchy. Use StandardDirectory for well-known Windows folders.

element_enrichments.name: DirectoryRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: DirectorySearch
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: DisableRollback
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: DotNetCompatibilityCheck
element_enrichments.remarks: Validates .NET compatibility for the application.

element_enrichments.name: DotNetCompatibilityCheckRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the NetFx extension for .NET Framework and .NET Core detection. Requires WixToolset.Netfx.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: DotNetCoreSdkFeatureBandSearch
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the NetFx extension for .NET Framework and .NET Core detection. Requires WixToolset.Netfx.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the NetFx extension for .NET Framework and .NET Core detection. Requires WixToolset.Netfx.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the NetFx extension for .NET Framework and .NET Core detection. Requires WixToolset.Netfx.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the NetFx extension for .NET Framework and .NET Core detection. Requires WixToolset.Netfx.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: DotNetCoreSearch
element_enrichments.remarks: Detects installed .NET Core/.NET 5+ runtime versions.

element_enrichments.name: DotNetCoreSearchRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the NetFx extension for .NET Framework and .NET Core detection. Requires WixToolset.Netfx.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: DuplicateFiles
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: EmbeddedChainer
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: EmbeddedChainerRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: EmbeddedUI
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: EmbeddedUIResource
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: EnsureTable
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Environment
element_enrichments.example:
<Environment Id="PathEnv"
    Name="PATH"
    Value="[INSTALLDIR]bin"
    Permanent="no"
    Part="last"
    Action="set"
    System="yes" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Modifies environment variables. Use Part='last' to append to PATH safely.

element_enrichments.name: Error
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: EventManifest
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: EventSource
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Exclude
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Exclusion
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ExePackage
element_enrichments.example:
<ExePackage Id="VCRedist"
    SourceFile="vc_redist.x64.exe"
    InstallArguments="/quiet /norestart"
    UninstallArguments="/uninstall /quiet"
    DetectCondition="VCRedistInstalled"
    Permanent="no"
    Vital="yes" />
element_enrichments.remarks: An EXE package in a bundle chain. Requires DetectCondition for upgrade detection.

element_enrichments.name: ExePackagePayload
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ExecuteAction
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ExitCode
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ExitEarlyWithSuccess
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Extension
element_enrichments.example:
<Extension Id="myfile"
    ContentType="application/x-myfile">
    <Verb Id="open" Command="Open" TargetFile="MyApp.exe" Argument='"%1"' />
</Extension>
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: FailWhenDeferred
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Failure
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Feature
element_enrichments.example:
<Feature Id="MainFeature"
    Title="Main Application"
    Description="Core application files"
    Level="1">
    <ComponentGroupRef Id="ProductComponents" />
</Feature>
element_enrichments.remarks: Features allow users to select what to install. Level='1' means installed by default; Level='0' means hidden/not installed.

element_enrichments.name: FeatureGroup
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: FeatureGroupRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: FeatureRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: File
element_enrichments.example:
<File Id="MyApp.exe"
    Name="MyApp.exe"
    Source="bin\Release\MyApp.exe"
    KeyPath="yes">
    <Shortcut Id="StartMenuShortcut"
        Directory="ProgramMenuFolder"
        Name="My Application"
        WorkingDirectory="INSTALLDIR" />
</File>
element_enrichments.remarks: Represents a file to be installed. The KeyPath file in a component determines component state for repair operations.

element_enrichments.name: FileCost
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: FileSearch
element_enrichments.remarks: Searches for files during AppSearch. Use Result='exists' for presence check.

element_enrichments.name: FileSearchRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: FileShare
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: FileSharePermission
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: FileTypeMask
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Files
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: FindRelatedProducts
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: FindVisualStudio
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the VisualStudio extension. Requires WixToolset.VisualStudio.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: FirewallException
element_enrichments.example:
<firewall:FirewallException Id="MyAppFirewall"
    Name="My Application"
    Program="[#MyApp.exe]"
    Protocol="tcp"
    Port="8080"
    Scope="any" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates Windows Firewall exception rule. Specify Port and Protocol for network access.

element_enrichments.name: ForceReboot
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: FormatFile
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Fragment
element_enrichments.remarks: A reusable fragment that can be referenced from other files. Use for modular installer design.

element_enrichments.name: GetCapabilities
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the DirectX extension. Requires WixToolset.DirectX.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Group
element_enrichments.example:
<util:Group Id="AppUsers"
    Name="MyApp Users"
    Description="Users of My Application" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates local groups. Useful for permission management.

element_enrichments.name: GroupRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: HttpHeader
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Icon
element_enrichments.remarks: Defines an icon used for shortcuts or Add/Remove Programs. Reference with IconRef.

element_enrichments.name: IconRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: IgnoreTable
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Include
element_enrichments.remarks: Marks a file as an include file for use with <?include?> preprocessor directive.

element_enrichments.name: IniFile
element_enrichments.example:
<IniFile Id="AppSettings"
    Name="app.ini"
    Directory="INSTALLDIR"
    Section="Settings"
    Key="InstallPath"
    Value="[INSTALLDIR]"
    Action="createLine" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: IniFileSearch
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: InstallExecuteSequence

element_enrichments.name: MajorUpgrade
element_enrichments.example:
<MajorUpgrade
    DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version is already installed."
    Schedule="afterInstallInitialize"
    AllowDowngrades="no"
    AllowSameVersionUpgrades="no" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Handles major upgrade scenarios automatically. Recommended for most packages. Prevents downgrades by default.

element_enrichments.name: ManagedBootstrapperApplicationPrereqInformation
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Bal (Bootstrapper Application Library) extension. Requires WixToolset.Bal.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Media
element_enrichments.remarks: Defines a cabinet file for storing compressed files. Use MediaTemplate for simpler single-cabinet scenarios.

element_enrichments.name: MediaTemplate
element_enrichments.remarks: Simplified media definition. Creates single embedded cabinet. Recommended for most packages.

element_enrichments.name: Merge

element_enrichments.name: MessageQueue
element_enrichments.example:
<msmq:MessageQueue Id="MyQueue"
    PathName=".\Private$\MyQueue"
    Label="My Message Queue"
    Transactional="yes" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Msmq extension for Microsoft Message Queuing. Requires WixToolset.Msmq.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: MessageQueuePermission

element_enrichments.name: MsiPackage
element_enrichments.example:
<MsiPackage Id="MainProduct"
    SourceFile="MyApp.msi"
    DisplayInternalUI="no"
    Compressed="yes"
    Vital="yes">
    <MsiProperty Name="INSTALLDIR" Value="[InstallFolder]" />
</MsiPackage>
element_enrichments.remarks: An MSI package in a bundle chain. Use DisplayInternalUI='yes' to show the MSI's own UI.

element_enrichments.name: Package
element_enrichments.example:
<Package Name="My Application"
    Version="1.0.0"
    Manufacturer="My Company"
    UpgradeCode="{GUID}"
    Scope="perMachine"
    Compressed="yes">
    <MajorUpgrade DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version is installed." />
</Package>
element_enrichments.remarks: Defines an MSI package. This is the main container for MSI-based installations. Use Bundle for bootstrapper/chainer scenarios.

    DisplayName="My Application Hotfix 1"
    MoreInfoURL="https://example.com/hotfix1">
    <PatchFamily Id="MyPatch" Version="1.0.0.1" />
</Patch>

<ProgId Id="MyApp.Document"
    Description="My Application Document"
    Icon="AppIcon">
    <Extension Id="mydoc" ContentType="application/x-mydoc">
        <Verb Id="open" Command="Open" TargetFile="MyApp.exe" Argument='"%1"' />
    </Extension>
</ProgId>

<RadioButtonGroup Property="SELECTOPTION">
    <RadioButton Value="1" X="10" Y="10" Width="200" Height="17" Text="Option 1" />
    <RadioButton Value="2" X="10" Y="30" Width="200" Height="17" Text="Option 2" />
</RadioButtonGroup>

element_enrichments.name: RegistryKey
element_enrichments.example:
<RegistryKey Root="HKLM"
    Key="SOFTWARE\MyCompany\MyApp">
    <RegistryValue Name="Version" Type="string" Value="1.0.0" />
    <RegistryValue Name="InstallDir" Type="string" Value="[INSTALLDIR]" />
</RegistryKey>
element_enrichments.remarks: Container for registry values. Use Root='HKLM' for per-machine, Root='HKCU' for per-user settings.

element_enrichments.name: RegistrySearch
element_enrichments.remarks: Searches registry during AppSearch. Use Result attribute to specify what to retrieve.

element_enrichments.name: RegistrySearchRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: RegistryValue
element_enrichments.example:
<RegistryValue Root="HKLM"
    Key="SOFTWARE\MyCompany\MyApp"
    Name="Installed"
    Type="integer"
    Value="1"
    KeyPath="yes" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates a registry value. Can be used as KeyPath for components in user profile directories.

element_enrichments.name: ServiceArgument
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ServiceConfig
element_enrichments.remarks: Configures service failure actions. Use with ServiceInstall for robust service management.

element_enrichments.name: ServiceConfigFailureActions
element_enrichments.example:
<ServiceConfigFailureActions
    OnInstall="yes"
    OnReinstall="yes"
    OnUninstall="no"
    ResetPeriod="86400">
    <Failure Action="restart" Delay="60" />
    <Failure Action="restart" Delay="120" />
    <Failure Action="none" Delay="0" />
</ServiceConfigFailureActions>
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ServiceControl
element_enrichments.example:
<ServiceControl Id="ControlMyService"
    Name="MyService"
    Start="install"
    Stop="both"
    Remove="uninstall"
    Wait="yes" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Controls service start/stop during install/uninstall. Always pair with ServiceInstall.

element_enrichments.name: ServiceDependency
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ServiceInstall
element_enrichments.example:
<ServiceInstall Id="MyService"
    Name="MyService"
    DisplayName="My Application Service"
    Description="Background service for My Application"
    Type="ownProcess"
    Start="auto"
    ErrorControl="normal"
    Account="NT AUTHORITY\LocalService" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Installs a Windows service. Must be paired with ServiceControl for proper lifecycle management.

element_enrichments.name: SetDirectory
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Shortcut
element_enrichments.example:
<Shortcut Id="DesktopShortcut"
    Name="My Application"
    Description="Launch My Application"
    Directory="DesktopFolder"
    Target="[#MyApp.exe]"
    WorkingDirectory="INSTALLDIR"
    Icon="AppIcon" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates a shortcut. Must be inside a Component. Use Directory attribute to specify location (DesktopFolder, ProgramMenuFolder).

element_enrichments.name: ShortcutProperty
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: SoftwareTagRef

element_enrichments.name: SqlDatabase
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates or connects to a SQL Server database. Set CreateOnInstall='yes' to create during installation.

element_enrichments.name: SqlFileSpec
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Sql extension for SQL Server database deployment. Requires WixToolset.Sql.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: SqlLogFileSpec
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Sql extension for SQL Server database deployment. Requires WixToolset.Sql.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: SqlScript
element_enrichments.example:
<sql:SqlScript Id="CreateTables"
    BinaryRef="CreateTablesScript"
    ExecuteOnInstall="yes"
    RollbackOnInstall="yes"
    SqlDb="MyDatabase"
    Sequence="1" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Executes SQL script during installation. Use RollbackScript for transactional safety.

element_enrichments.name: SqlString
element_enrichments.example:
<sql:SqlString Id="InsertVersion"
    SqlDb="MyDatabase"
    SQL="INSERT INTO Version (Ver) VALUES ('1.0.0')"
    ExecuteOnInstall="yes"
    Sequence="2" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Executes inline SQL statement. Use SqlScript for complex scripts.

element_enrichments.name: StandardDirectory
element_enrichments.remarks: References a well-known Windows folder like ProgramFilesFolder. Preferred over DirectoryRef for standard locations.

element_enrichments.name: StartServices
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: TouchFile
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: TypeLib
element_enrichments.example:
<TypeLib Id="{GUID}"
    Language="0"
    MajorVersion="1"
    MinorVersion="0"
    Description="My Type Library" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UI
element_enrichments.remarks: Container for UI elements. Use UIRef to reference built-in WiX UI sets like WixUI_Minimal or WixUI_InstallDir.

element_enrichments.name: UIRef
element_enrichments.remarks: References a built-in UI set. Common values: WixUI_Minimal, WixUI_InstallDir, WixUI_FeatureTree, WixUI_Mondo.

element_enrichments.name: UIText
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UnpublishComponents
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UnpublishFeatures
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UnregisterClassInfo
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UnregisterComPlus
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UnregisterExtensionInfo
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UnregisterFonts
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UnregisterMIMEInfo

element_enrichments.name: Update
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Upgrade
element_enrichments.example:
<Upgrade Id="{UPGRADE-CODE-GUID}">
    <UpgradeVersion Minimum="1.0.0"
        IncludeMinimum="yes"
        Maximum="2.0.0"
        IncludeMaximum="no"
        Property="PREVIOUSVERSIONSINSTALLED" />
</Upgrade>
element_enrichments.remarks: Lower-level upgrade detection. Use MajorUpgrade for simpler scenarios; Upgrade for complex version handling.

element_enrichments.name: UpgradeVersion
element_enrichments.example:
<UpgradeVersion Minimum="1.0.0"
    Maximum="1.9.9"
    IncludeMinimum="yes"
    IncludeMaximum="yes"
    OnlyDetect="no"
    Property="UPGRADEFOUND" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: UrlAce
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Http extension for HTTP namespace reservations and SSL bindings. Requires WixToolset.Http.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: UrlReservation
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Http extension for HTTP namespace reservations and SSL bindings. Requires WixToolset.Http.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: User
element_enrichments.example:
<util:User Id="ServiceUser"
    Name="MyAppService"
    Password="[SERVICE_PASSWORD]"
    CreateUser="yes"
    CanNotChangePassword="yes"
    PasswordNeverExpires="yes" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates local user accounts. Consider security implications; prefer service accounts for services.

element_enrichments.name: Validate
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: ValidateProductID
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: Variable
element_enrichments.remarks: Bundle variable for passing data between packages or storing state. Use bal:Overridable='yes' to allow command-line override.

element_enrichments.name: Verb
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: VsixPackage
element_enrichments.example:
<vs:VsixPackage
    File="MyExtension.vsix"
    PackageId="MyExtension.{GUID}"
    Permanent="no"
    Target="Community,Pro,Enterprise"
    TargetVersion="17.0"
    Vital="yes" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the VisualStudio extension. Requires WixToolset.VisualStudio.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WaitForEvent
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WaitForEventDeferred
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebAddress
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebAppPool
element_enrichments.example:
<iis:WebAppPool Id="MyAppPool"
    Name="MyApplication Pool"
    Identity="applicationPoolIdentity"
    ManagedRuntimeVersion="v4.0"
    ManagedPipelineMode="Integrated" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates an IIS application pool. Recommended: use ApplicationPoolIdentity for security.

element_enrichments.name: WebApplication
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates an IIS application under a website.

element_enrichments.name: WebApplicationExtension
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebDir
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebDirProperties
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebError
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebFilter
element_enrichments.example:
<iis:WebFilter Id="MyFilter"
    Name="My ISAPI Filter"
    Path="[#filter.dll]"
    LoadOrder="1" />
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebLog
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebProperty
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebServiceExtension
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the IIS extension for Internet Information Services configuration. Requires WixToolset.Iis.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WebSite
element_enrichments.example:
<iis:WebSite Id="MyWebSite"
    Description="My Website"
    Directory="INSTALLDIR"
    AutoStart="yes">
    <iis:WebAddress Id="AllHttp" Port="80" />
</iis:WebSite>
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates or configures an IIS website. Requires IIS to be installed on target machine.

element_enrichments.name: WebVirtualDir
element_enrichments.remarks: Creates an IIS virtual directory.

element_enrichments.name: WindowsFeatureSearch
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WindowsFeatureSearchRef
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Util extension with utility elements. Requires WixToolset.Util.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: Wix
element_enrichments.example:
<Wix xmlns="http://wixtoolset.org/schemas/v4/wxs">
    <Package Name="My Application"
        Version="1.0.0"
        Manufacturer="My Company"
        UpgradeCode="{GUID}">
        <!-- Package contents here -->
    </Package>
</Wix>
element_enrichments.remarks: Root element of every WiX source file. Must declare the WiX namespace.

element_enrichments.name: WixDotNetCoreBootstrapperApplicationHost
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Bal (Bootstrapper Application Library) extension. Requires WixToolset.Bal.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WixInternalUIBootstrapperApplication
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Bal (Bootstrapper Application Library) extension. Requires WixToolset.Bal.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WixManagedBootstrapperApplicationHost
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Bal (Bootstrapper Application Library) extension. Requires WixToolset.Bal.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WixPrerequisiteBootstrapperApplication
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the Bal (Bootstrapper Application Library) extension. Requires WixToolset.Bal.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WixStandardBootstrapperApplication
element_enrichments.remarks: The standard WiX bootstrapper UI. Choose Theme for different layouts (hyperlinkLicense, rtfLicense, etc.).

element_enrichments.name: WixUI
element_enrichments.remarks: Part of the UI extension for WiX UI dialogs. Requires WixToolset.UI.wixext reference.

element_enrichments.name: WixVariable
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: WriteEnvironmentStrings
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: WriteIniValues
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: WriteRegistryValues
element_enrichments.remarks: Core WiX element. See documentation for usage details and examples.

element_enrichments.name: XmlConfig
element_enrichments.example:
<util:XmlConfig Id="SetConnectionString"
    File="[INSTALLDIR]web.config"
    ElementPath="/configuration/connectionStrings/add[@name='Default']"
    Name="connectionString"
    Value="[CONNECTION_STRING]"
    Action="create"
    On="install"
    Node="value" />
element_enrichments.remarks: More powerful XML modification than XmlFile. Supports element creation and complex XPath.

element_enrichments.name: XmlFile
element_enrichments.remarks: Modifies XML files during installation. Use for config file customization. Test thoroughly with various existing configs.
